Initializer# init(scene:transition:isPaused:preferredFramesPerSecond:)

SpriteKitSwiftUIiOS 14.0+iPadOS 14.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 11.0+tvOS 14.0+visionOSwatchOS 7.0+

```
nonisolated
init(
    scene: SKScene,
    transition: SKTransition? = nil,
    isPaused: Bool = false,
    preferredFramesPerSecond: Int = 60
)
```
